title: Phase 1: Core models and enums
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/core/models.py with Pydantic models: PRStatus, CommentClassification, Priority, ReviewerType enums and Comment, CICheck, CIStatus, ThreadSummary, CacheStats, PRAnalysisResult models per design spec.

title: Phase 5: Public API exports
description: Update src/goodtomerge/__init__.py with proper exports: PRAnalyzer, Container, models, enums per design spec.

title: Phase 3: Claude Code parser
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/parsers/claude.py with patterns for must/should/error/bug vs consider/suggestion/might per design spec.

title: Phase 3: Generic parser
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/parsers/generic.py as fallback. Mark resolved/outdated as non-actionable, others as AMBIGUOUS.

title: Phase 5: CLI implementation
description: Update src/goodtomerge/cli.py with gtm check command, exit codes, JSON/text output, error redaction per design spec.

title: Phase 3: Cursor/Bugbot parser
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/parsers/cursor.py with patterns for Critical/High/Medium/Low severity per design spec.

title: Phase 6: Unit tests - security
description: Implement tests/unit/security/test_token_security.py, test_file_permissions.py, test_cache_key_sanitization.py, test_error_paths.py per security test spec.

title: Phase 3: Greptile parser
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/parsers/greptile.py with patterns for actionable comments count per design spec.

title: Phase 2: GitHub adapter
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/adapters/github.py with GitHubAdapter implementing GitHubPort. Use httpx for API calls, handle token securely.

title: Phase 1: Interfaces/ports
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/core/interfaces.py with abstract base classes: GitHubPort, CachePort, ReviewerParser per design spec.

title: Phase 4: PR Analyzer
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/core/analyzer.py with PRAnalyzer class orchestrating GitHub fetch, caching, parsing, and status determination.

title: Phase 6: Unit tests - models and validation
description: Implement tests/unit/core/test_models.py and tests/unit/security/test_input_validation.py per security test spec.

title: Phase 6: Integration tests
description: Implement tests/integration/test_cli.py and test_full_analysis.py for end-to-end testing.

title: Phase 3: CodeRabbit parser
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/parsers/coderabbit.py with patterns for Critical/Major/Minor/Nitpick/fingerprint/resolved per design spec.

title: Phase 1: Input validation
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/core/validation.py with validate_github_identifier(), validate_pr_number(), build_cache_key() per security spec.

title: Phase 1: Error handling
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/core/errors.py with RedactedError class and redact_error() function per security spec.

title: Phase 4: DI Container
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/container.py with Container dataclass, create_default() and create_for_testing() factory methods.

title: Phase 2: In-memory cache adapter
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/adapters/cache_memory.py with InMemoryCacheAdapter for testing. Simple dict-based implementation.

title: Phase 6: Unit tests - parsers
description: Implement tests/unit/parsers/test_*.py for all 5 parsers with fixture-based testing per design spec.

title: Phase 2: SQLite cache adapter
description: Implement src/goodtomerge/adapters/cache_sqlite.py with SqliteCacheAdapter. Include 0600 file permissions, TTL support, pattern invalidation.
